DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study observe therapeutic effect combine resistance aerobic exercise training ( CRAE ) hyperinsulemia obese adolescent girl . Forty obese adolescent girl ( 14Â±1 year ) participate study . The participant randomly separate two group ; no-exercise group ( n=20 ) exercise group ( n=20 ) . The exercise group perform 12 week CRAE .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Combined Resistance Aerobic Exercise Training Obesity Adolescent Girls
DOC.criteria: Obese Hyperinsulinemia Obese Abdominal obesity Hypertension Pregnancy Chronic disease Weight loss diet within last 6 month
